title: Call is getting louder for the arrest of Sarath Fonseka
content: Source: AT – By K.T.Rajasingham Now that the Presidential election is over and Mahinda Rajapaksha has been elected for the second term as the President of Sri Lanka and the call for the arrest of Retired Gen. Sarath Fonseka is becoming more louder and louder for his excesses. The retired General, who contested against his…
